com.silvergobletgames.sylver.core

Class SceneObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silvergobletgames.sylver.core.SceneObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NetworkedSceneObject, Window, WindowComponent

    public abstract class SceneObject
extends java.lang.Object
    SceneObjects are the main building blocks of the game. This abstract SceneObject class represents the core functionality required of anything that wants to be added to a scene.

      • setOwningScene

        public void setOwningScene(Scene scene)
        Sets the owning scene of this SceneObject. This method should exclusively be used in the add(SceneObject) method of a Scene to avoid timing and ownership problems.
        Parameters:
        scene - Scene to which this SceneObject will belong

      • addToGroup

        public final void addToGroup(java.lang.Enum grp)
        Maps this SceneObject to a new group. These groups are used to organize SceneObjects.
        Parameters:
        grp - group for this SceneObject to be a part of

      • removeFromGroup

        public final void removeFromGroup(java.lang.Enum grp)
        Removes this SceneObject from association with given group
        Parameters:
        grp - group to remove from the SceneObject

      • getGroups

        public final java.util.LinkedHashSet<java.lang.Enum> getGroups()
        Returns the set of groups that this SceneObject belongs to.
        Returns:
        the set of groups that this SceneObject belongs to

      • isInGroup

        public final boolean isInGroup(java.lang.Enum group)
        Checks to see if this SceneObject is part of a given group
        Parameters:
        group - group to see if the SceneObject belongs to
        Returns:
        true if the SceneObject belongs to this group, false otherwise
